fragment.title: WP Tech — a revisit of a tech agency's visual identity
fragment.desc: A complete rebranding of a full—solution tech agency. The project covered setting up a visual identity for the agency, logo and graphical design, UX/UI design for a new website.
fragment.intro:
As a newly formed tech agency was looking to make a break on the tech market, they were looking to rebrand themselves and update their visual identity. The goal with the project was to create a new logotype, website, create templates for social media posts, and to structure a visual identity that aligned with the tech agencys' mission.

The design process was conducted according to a competitive design process and the design was examined and approved by the shareholders of the company. The final design was approved after 3 iterations (4 design alternatives).
